WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 03 FEB
   BY M/V POLARCUS NAILA TOWING 12 7000 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-58.5S 039-41.5W, 22-00.3S 039-37.5W,
   22-21.7S 039-48.3W, 22-37.5S 040-00.3W,
   22-24.7S 040-21.9W, 22-11.1S 040-11.7W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 180/21.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 04 FEB 21.
